column5: Just opened my emails and there was the link for the latest e-mag. I had just got back home after a job, so coffee and smoke time. I thoroughly enjoyed each article. A tip of the hat to the authors and T.J for putting it together.
Thanks...  they have come along way since the first one.. I believe that Justin has written something for every one but one...  Ive .. (unbelievably) never missed a month.
Consistently good read, and I have learned quite a bit from the articles...  Thanks, Mike
hOW DO I SIGN UP FOR THE E MAG.
Always a great read.  Enjoy the great info that gets pasted on.
